document_data.caption: A [[thief]] delights in leaving behind a trail of false footprints with his liar's boots.
document_data.name: ''Liar's Boots''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|91}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Liar's boots''''' were a variety of [[enchanted]] [[boots]] that could aid in evading pursuers,{{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|90}}
document_data.Powers:
When activated, ''liar's boots'' would leave footprints in a direction of the wearer's choice (which must be mentally concentrated upon) and left no footprints of the actual direction the wearer walked with them. This effect could be activated twice per day.

The maximum length by which a false trail could be made or extended out to was {{SIrange|100|600|yards|long=yes}}. Upon going beyond that limit or removing the ''liar's boots'', the wearer's real footprints would begin to appear while their false ones dissipated.
document_data.Notable Owners: Most guilds in the Dalelands possessed one or more pairs of ''liar's boots''.
